title: CEP Campaign Finance Office Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for public offices associated with candidates and elections in campaign finance data.

terms.label: President
terms.definition: The office of President of the United States or its direct functional equivalent in other jurisdictions.

terms.label: U.S. Senate
terms.definition: The office of United States Senator or a comparable upper-chamber national legislative office.

terms.label: U.S. House of Representatives
terms.definition: The office of United States Representative or a comparable lower-chamber national legislative office.

terms.label: Governor
terms.definition: The chief executive office of a state, province, or equivalent subnational jurisdiction.

terms.label: State or Provincial Upper Chamber
terms.definition: A state, provincial, or regional legislative upper-chamber office, such as a State Senate.

terms.label: State or Provincial Lower Chamber
terms.definition: A state, provincial, or regional legislative lower-chamber office, such as a State House or Assembly.

terms.label: Local Executive
terms.definition: A local executive office such as mayor, county executive, or similar municipal leader.

terms.label: Local Legislative
terms.definition: A local legislative office such as city council member, county board member, or equivalent.

terms.label: Judicial Office
terms.definition: A judicial office such as judge or justice at any level of the court system where campaigns are reported.

terms.label: Other Office
terms.definition: An office not covered by any more specific term in this vocabulary.
